name: Ext_R5_Procedure_pe_actor
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Procedure.performer.actor for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Procedure.performer.actor from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Procedure|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Indicates who or what performed the procedure.
element.comment: `Procedure.performer.actor` maps to R4B `Procedure.performer.actor`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CareTeam)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/HealthcareService)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
